basic_information.scholarship_name: Carol Hamilton Creative Writing Endowed Scholarship

description: This scholarship was established by Drs. Stephen and Tamela Hamilton in honor of their mother, UCO alumna and former faculty member Carol Hamilton. The scholarship is awarded to a promising writer in the UCO Master of Arts in Creative Writing program. Eligibility Requirements Show promise as a Creative Writing student First-year of the UCO Master of Arts in Creative Writing program Continuing student in the fall semester that the scholarship was awarded Attach a 5-10 page creative writing sample

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Creative Writing   or SIS_Major_2 is English-Creative Writing   or SIS_Major is Creative Writing   or SIS_Major is English-Creative Writing   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Creative Writing   or SIS_Major_1_2 is English-Creative Writing   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Creative Writing   or SIS_Major_2_2 is English-Creative Writing
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Creative Writing   or SIS_Major_2 is English-Creative Writing   or SIS_Major is Creative Writing   or SIS_Major is English-Creative Writing   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Creative Writing   or SIS_Major_1_2 is English-Creative Writing   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Creative Writing   or SIS_Major_2_2 is English-Creative Writing

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
